instruction: Timile ghaṭi kasto thik cha bhannai test kasari garna sakchhau?
response: Ghaṭi test garna nimti, timi taulo ramrari ghumaauna, khoki hera, ani gaaro bhaye doctor sanga sampark garna sakchau.

instruction: Hawa-maan ko report kasari lekhnuhos?
response: Hawa-maan ko report lekhna nimti, taaja weather data samet, tapai ko chet ma huney taapman, hawa, ra barsha ko janakari sammelan garnuhos.

instruction: Email pathaune tarika samjhauna.
response: Email pathauna ko lagi, tapai ko email app kholnu hos, naya email ma click garnuhos, recipient ko email thikana halnu hos, subject ani message lekhi 'Send' button thichnu hos.

instruction: Nepali ma 'Book' ko arth k ho?
response: Nepali ma 'Book' ko arth 'Kitab' ho.

instruction: Computer reset garne process bataunuhos.
response: Computer reset garna, settings kholnu hos, 'System' ma januhos, ani 'Reset PC' option select garera direction follow garnuhos.

instruction: Ek cup chiya kasari bancha?
response: Ek cup chiya banaunda, paani ra dudh ustai matra ma uhali, chini ra chiya pathi halera ramrari uhalauna, ani chhane ani serve garna sakinchha.

instruction: Android phone ma password kasari set garne?
response: Settings ma januhos, 'Security' option ma click garnuhos, 'Set Password' ma januhos, ani afno mann parne password rakhnuhos.

instruction: Nepal ko rajdhani ko naam ke ho?
response: Nepal ko rajdhani ko naam Kathmandu ho.

instruction: Ek cup dudh kasari tatyaune?
response: Ek cup dudh tatyauna, pahela tapain stove balnuhos, ek tapko bhanda ma dudh halera stove ma rakhnu hos, ani halko taal ma tatyaunu hos.

instruction: Facebook account kasari kholne?
response: Facebook account kholna, facebook.com ma januhos, 'Create New Account' ma click garnuhos, afno naam, email, ani password halera sign up garnuhos.

instruction: Kathmandu dekhi Pokhara samma ko distance kati cha?
response: Kathmandu dekhi Pokhara samma ko distance karib 200 kilometers cha.

instruction: Ek rupaiya ma kati paisa huncha?
response: Ek rupaiya ma 100 paisa huncha.

response: Phone recharge garna, recharge card ma diyeko code dial garnuhos: *122*PIN#, ani call button thichnu hos.

response: Hawa-maan sammandhi suchana internet, TV, radio ko news ya taaja weather apps bata pauna sakinchha.

response: Online shopping garna e-commerce site ma januhos, chahine product select garnuhos, cart ma rakhera afno delivery details ani payment garnuhos.

instruction: Ek rupaiya ko hisab le 10 rupaiya ko pirohan garnuhos.
response: Ek rupaiya ko hisab le, 10 rupaiya ko pirohan 10 rukh, 10 swastik, 10 sundar karyakram jasto garaune ho.

instruction: Chiya ko recipe lekhnuhos.

instruction: Garmi ma thanda rahane upaya ke ke hun?

instruction: Cycle ma puncture bhaye kasari milaaune?
response: Cycle ko puncture milaauna, tube lai nikalera pani ma jachnu hos. Puncture ko thau patayera rubber patch ani glue lagayera chhode pachhi milcha.
